title: Calories in a Sausage Patty
meta_description: Discover calories in sausage patty, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Pork breakfast sausage patty, cooked (pan-fried), ~26 g per patty, no added seasonings or oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type, size, cooking method, and additives. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked pork sausage patty has ~100 kcal and ~5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one sausage patty?
faqs.a: About 100 kcal for a standard cooked pork sausage patty.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage patty?
Are sausage patties high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically ~300 mg sodium per patty due to seasonings.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in sausage patty?
faqs.a: Pan-frying adds fat; baking or air-frying keeps it lower.

faqs.q: What's a lower-calorie alternative to pork sausage patty?
faqs.a: Turkey or chicken sausage patties have ~70 kcal each.
